name: Silent Maze
description: Do you like mazes? ... No? Since you don't like seeing the maze, we can turn off the lights and have a maze in the dark instead. What? Still no? Alright, alright. How about we also throw in some cheap non-scary low-quality jump scares? ... Still no? But we also got annoying traps and puzzles in the maze to make your life worst too. Why not give it a try ... pretty please? We promise this isn't scary at all.
